menus.html:
How to use the Scanner app

The scanning app provides an easy way for venues and promoters to scan tickets at events without the need for any additional hardware! 

Here is step by step how to use the Scanner App


  1. The costumer should open the order that will be scanned. Scan the order  by placing the device  of the costumer  under the phone's camera. The  QR code  will be  scanned automatically.



  2. After the successful scan it will be displayed the order details. And if the order is doesn't used yet, you will see the button to the bottom "Use the ticket".



  3. Now, to use the order just click on the button to use the ticket. And then should display alert that says that "Now the ticket is used".



  4. Now because the ticket is used, you should see that  ticket is already used.



    NOTE: If you click on the button it should display alert that says that "Ticket is already used"




    So that is it. We are hoping that you will enjoying using our app.
